posts.post_content:
Posted By: Danny Grimes
I have a request for my father, im looking for a Roger Connor baseball card. Im not to knowledgeable on pre-1900 stuff, so im assuming he might have an old judge card or something along that line.. Looking for any condition, nothing pristine please. 


thanks give an email

dg_480@yahoo.com



Danny

Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
Danny,

What's your budget?

Posted By: Danny Grimes
why is he that astronomical? [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/sad.gif[/IMG]

Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
I was only asking because there might be someone out there that has one available.  Perhaps you might have better luck if you let everyone know how much you have to spend.  If you happen to get 10 offers for Connor cards then you may consider the offer a tad bit generous.   In the past few months I've seen two Connor cards sell for less than a grand.  Each had some pretty big issues though.  I figure you might find a decent one for about $1200+

Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
Danny,

Check the following link:

[url]http://www.network54.com/Forum/355834/thread/1165370775/last-1165446981/many+Old+Judges+for+sale%2C+some+rare[/url]

There's a Connor for $1K.  As far as it all goes it's a good price for the card.  Good Luck!
